endpoints.description: Retrieve current metrics data collected from the data center infrastructure for analysis.
Send an alert configuration to be triggered on specific conditions met within the metrics.
Retrieve the list of active alert configurations for monitoring infrastructure status.
Update the configuration of a specific sensor by its unique identifier.
Remove a specific sensor configuration by its unique identifier.
Generate and retrieve the daily performance report of the data center infrastructure.
Request and generate a custom report based on specified metrics and time ranges.
Retrieve the current breakdown of energy consumption across the data center components.
Adjust the parameters and thresholds for resource optimization strategies.
Retrieve a health overview of the entire data center system integrity status.
